mapper.select: select ifnull((avg(score_clean) + avg(score_location) + avg(score_service)) / 3, 0) from review join room on review.room_id = room.room_id join member on room.member_id = member.member_id where member.member_id = #{memberId}
select ifnull(sum(hits), 0) from room_hits join room on room.room_id = room_hits.room_id where read_date = current_date - interval #{interval} day and room.member_id = #{memberId};

select ifnull(SUM(payment.price - payment.commission), 0) from payment join reservation on reservation.reservation_id = payment.reservation_id join room on reservation.room_id = room.room_id where room.member_id = #{memberId} and (reservation.status = 'complete') and payment.cancel_date is null and ((payment.create_date - now()) < 31);

select ifnull(SUM(payment.price - payment.commission), 0) from payment join reservation on reservation.reservation_id = payment.reservation_id join room on reservation.room_id = room.room_id where room.member_id = #{memberId} and (reservation.status = 'complete') and payment.cancel_date is null
and (now() < payment.create_date < now() + interval 1 year);

select count(price) from payment join reservation on reservation.reservation_id = payment.reservation_id where member_id = #{memberId} and (reservation.status = 'complete') and payment.cancel_date is null
and (now() < payment.create_date < now() + interval 1 year) ;

select count(reservation_id) from reservation join room on room.room_id = reservation.room_id where room.member_id = #{memberId}
and reservation.status <> 'cancel' and reservation.update_target is null and (reservation.create_date < now() + interval 30 day);

SELECT ifnull(sum(payment.price - payment.commission), 0) FROM payment join reservation on reservation.reservation_id = payment.reservation_id join room on reservation.room_id = room.room_id where room.member_id = #{memberId}
and last_day(now() - interval 1 year) + interval (12 - month(now())) month + interval #{interval} month < payment.create_date and payment.create_date <= last_day(now() - interval 1 year) + interval (12 - month(now())) month + interval (1 + #{interval}) month and (reservation.status = 'complete') and payment.cancel_date is null ;
